Package com.abcs.hrrs.utils

Class DBUtils

java.lang.Object
com.abcs.hrrs.utils.DBUtils
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DBUtils extends Object implements Serializable
Utility class to handle DB operations such setting up a connection, executing queries, committing transactions for various tables;
See Also:
